channel.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
channel.description: Am I allowed to post this or no?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Not sure why this wasn’t locked; the request was answered a while ago.

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:16, topic:316590”]Wait one fucking minute. What’s the point of capitalizing phishing and tutorial in your title? Does it make you think that it looks as though it’s more sophisticated?

And please don’t type “Am I allowed to post this or no.” It makes you sound like an ignorant fool. It must be “Am I allowed to post such a thing or not?” You can not say “or no” at the end of a fucking sentence.

There is no point to this madness.[/quote]
ahhaha I swear someone took this guy down… they must have deleted their post

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.description:
@goatee wrote:

“Yes or no?” … you obviously can.

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Wait one fucking minute. What’s the point of capitalizing phishing and tutorial in your title? Does it make you think that it looks as though it’s more sophisticated?

And please don’t type “Am I allowed to post this or no.” It makes you sound like an ignorant fool. It must be “Am I allowed to post such a thing or not?” You can not say “or no” at the end of a fucking sentence.

There is no point to this madness.

Read full topic

the true question is ‘am i allowed to post?’ and as such the true answer is ‘no’

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Write a tutorial on how to make a login system (something useful perhaps?) and then if they can’t work out how to adapt it to a more menacing use then they’re an idiot.

It’s be like writing a tutorial on how to keylog someone, while that is unethical you could write an educational tutorial on logging keystrokes but apply it to another more “normal” use.

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

I don’t see why someone who can’t do this is an idiot. If you asked some random people in the street if they could make a website which captures and stores two data fields, what are the chances of them saying yes?

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:316590”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=413132.msg3043774#msg3043774 date=1259329569]
Why would anyone NEED one?

Ask for username and password, ???, Profit
[/quote]

Exactly. It’s pretty obvious how to do it, also obvious is that if you do it you are an idiot. So there is no need to post one.[/quote]

IMO, those who fall for it are bigger idiots.

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?

item.title: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Fat Cookies:

protip: make a phising tutorial that looks like an ordinary tutorial but do not make it obvious. Then you can add small hints about making into a phis. Then you have educated people, it becomes the users choice on whether to use it as a phis or not.

So if somebody shows someone how to retrieve some person’s credit card number through an educational phishing tutorial and throw small hints at them explaining how to do it makes it alright, right?

Read full topic
item.source: Am I allowed to post a Phishing Tutorial?
